Хорошая игра)
Приятно проводить время как одному, так и с друзьями)
Контент очень часто пополняется, постоянно выходят новые убийцы и выжившие и соответственно новые перки)
Есть конечно и небольшие минусы, но куда уж без них:

- Играя за убийцу есть шанс угодить к токсикам кибер котлетам или к читерам, ну тут ничего не поделаешь) (можно ливнуть>:) или попытаться переиграть) даже некоторых читеров можно убить)
- Играя за выжившего, можно попасть к кемперу или тунеллеру или все вместе) ну тут тоже как повезёт)

В общем и целом игра шикарна)
This game is addictive. They do a great job of bringing some of my fave horror characters to life. Especially great to play with friends, although I've managed to make friends in-game as well.
The Devs of this game do not listen to their community. Would not recommend.

After a little more consideration after my last review I decided not to recommend for a few reasons which are why I don't enjoy playing anymore and has been issues with lots of other players. My main issue is the new matchmaking, it's good for survivors but more difficult for killers especially for those who can't play constantly. I rarely touch killer since the matchmaking update due to having less fun, being matched with people with a whole group of high mmr makes it difficult which is understandable because you're good but not when your still being matched when you take long breaks or only play 1 day a week and you're going against iri's when you're only ash rank showing I don't play often. New ranks shown has also been off putting, all it does is show how much you play and not skill, all my hard work being red ranks previously are just thrown out the window. I've recently noticed the dev's kinda just make unwanted changes in random updates like its only what the DEVS want, if something gets mixed reviews by the public you probably shouldn't implement them. An example is the hud update and the newest is the rank update both not necessary with both causing players to get upset. I honestly can't have as much fun anymore with dbd as I use to, it feels too try hard for killers atm with its hidden mmr matchmaking since they increased the chances of getting full groups of high mmr, feels like meta perks are a must unlike before. Last topic I want to cover is totems, there spawns have always been an issue with some being unbreakable and others just being right in front of a survivor spawn or a gen, It should always be made sure totem spawns are balanced as its an object meant to be searched for and not just handed to and also not in such a weird place its unbreakable. This issue shouldn't be this far into the game. Small issues with this game is obviously bugs and theres too many to list so I'm leaving it there.
its fun, killer load times can be atrocious tho
I LOVE THIS GAME I PLAY EVERY MILSECOND I CAN

屠夫遇到会配合车队除了护士长 走地屠夫根本没法玩 车队有配合 语音交流 暴屠夫位置 所以车队跟透视挂有什么分别？ 屠夫就一个人 要找人 要抓人 还要被遛 玩屠夫太难了 而且屠夫一直削弱 人类一直加强 感觉屠夫就是个陪玩 不建议新手玩 非要玩有队友还好 没队友单排会被各种卖 队友各种逛街不修机 所以玩屠夫生气 玩人也生气 我是来开心玩游戏的 不是来受气的

Playing this game is like using crack: The first time, you feel great. But that feeling gets smaller and smaller each time you do it. You start to get angry. People notice that you've changed. You begin to hate yourself for doing it. But you just can't stop.
very very very very very good

Super fun game, especially with friends. I dont mind that you have to pay for new killer and surviors, however, the fact that you have to pay for their perks sucks. This game has so many fun and creative perks but you only get to experiance a fraction of them unless you spend 100 bucks on all of the DLCS. I feel a good solution would be to make killer and such dlc still but make all perks much more accesable, that way people will experiement and not run the same 4 over and over

Пускай ты и chad, который залетел в игру почиллить на сурве/мане. 
Не важно какой ты раг и сколько у тебя часов.
Против тебя всегда будет обрыган/фул стак обрыганов 3k h+ без личной жизни и годами дрочева паллет и лупов.

Edit 2: I am starting to play this game again to prep for the update. It looks good and may actually change my opinion of this game, so we'll see where it goes.

The game was fun for a while, then mmr came and has shifted me to not playing this game much anymore. They have effectively killed the casual aspect of this game, thus removing any aspect of fun for survivors while killers need to actually play/build like they are prepping for a tournament. The dev team rarely listen to community figures on problems with the game in favor of what seems like bi-weekly cosmetic releases, showing that they are either out of ideas or are in decline and are scrounging around for consumer's money. I really liked the idea of this game and how it use to be, but sadly a recent history of bad releases and bad changes has left myself and others in a state where leaving this game for another seems like the best choice.

Edit: Reinstalled this on April 2022 to try it out after hearing it has gotten better, first match was against a bubba who used a map offering, 2 purple addons (one where he can see through walls while revving), gen block perk and 3 slowdown perks (forgot their names due to not playing). Needless to say my friends and I instantly uninstalled after that, mmr sure is working great when all 4 of us should be near the lowest bracket but puts us against that.

In conclusion, leave and don't come back until this game actually gets fun without competitive builds being used 99% of the time.
es un buen juego para jugar con amigos

scary :( but fun :)
only play this game
- if you like management games (BECAUSE you're going to be playing generator simulator half the time)
- if you like strategy games BECAUSE you have to run away from the killer, around, in and out of buildings on many maps half the time
- if you like playing games with others, such as friends or online strangers
- if you can get used to scary humans (killers and trolling teammates)
- if you like shooting games this is perfect for you since you get to grief 4 people at once
A great game that scratches an itch I had no idea I ever had! Good to play on your own as a killer and even better with friends as survivors! Great deal during sales
JOgo bom, da medo, mas é bom

sometimes it'll make you want to lose your mind but who truly needs their sanity anyways <3
I haven't had this much fun playing a game in a while. Games aren't too long and you can play both sides (survivor or killer). Characters make it super fun with abilities.
心态放平和不去考虑每把四杀或者每把逃出去的话，这是款非常优秀的非对称竞技游戏。当成佛系玩玩赚血点的集卡游戏就行了，我觉得人屠矛盾被大家说得太严重了：我不否认有素质低的玩家，但是绝大多数的玩家都还是抱着切磋的心态在爱着dbd，希望官方可以增加更更灵活的自定义人机，帮助双方熟悉地图、磨练技巧。
